text: Ia gumazir igharazibar biziba okɨava, egha gumazibav sozi da ariaghiri. Egha poroghamiba uari isava akuir arazim gamuavɨra iti. Egha uan akaba gavgavim dar anɨngasa akam akɨri, egha ia guizbangɨra akar ifavaribagh ami. Egha ia asem Bal, a bagha ofan mughuriar aghuim zuibagh ami. Egha ia aser ia faragha fozir puvatɨzibar ziaba fe.
